 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package activity.classes

Class Summary
AdvancedSearchActivity This activity allows users to input additional parameters when browsing through their images.
CompareActivity Display 2 images on the same view for visual inspection by the user.
FActivity This abstract class provides the basic functionality and order of creation operations for a generic Activity for the MoleFinder application.
ImageActivity This activity allows the user to view his/her images in an ImageView.
LoginActivity This activity allows the user to login using a password set on initial use of the application.
MoleFinderActivity This is the main activity for MoleFinder.
NewImageActivity This activity is used to save images and call the camera activities.
NewPasswordActivity This activity is only called on the initial creation of the database to allow the user to set the password they will use to log into the application in the future.
NewTagActivity This activity creates or overwrites a tag stored in the database.
ReviewImagesActivity This activity displays a list of available tags in the spinner at the top, and once selected displays a list of conditions that are currently stored in the database with the corresponding tag.
ReviewPatientsActivity This activity allows doctor users to manage the patients they have saved in their system or add new patients if necessary.
ReviewTagsActivity This activity displays a clickable list of tags currently in the database.
